Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO MENTAL HEALTH

Title: Designates records and information relating to a patient who has been deceased for a period of fifty years or longer as historic records no longer subject to privacy protections
Summary: Designates records and information relating to a patient who has been deceased for a period of fifty years or longer as historic records no longer subject to privacy protections; provides that such provisions shall not be construed as requiring a facility to retain records for any particular length of time.
LawCode: Amd ยง33.13, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to designating records and information relating to a patient who has been deceased for a period of fifty years or longer as historic records no longer subject to privacy protections
